title: The End of Cookies: Tracking's Uncertain Future
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The End of Cookies: Tracking's Uncertain Future.

hook.text: Third-party cookies tracked you across the internet for 25 years. Now browsers are killing them. What comes next?

buildup.text: Cookies let advertisers follow you from site to site, building detailed profiles of your browsing behavior.

discovery.text: Safari and Firefox already block third-party cookies. Chrome plans to phase them out, affecting 60% of web traffic.
